Title: Repeals section 37-0121 of the environmental conservation law
Summary: Repeals provisions of law relating to the prohibition against the use of perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances in apparel and outdoor apparel for severe wet conditions.
LawCode: Rpld ยง37-0121, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal section 37-0121 of the environmental conservation law, relating to the prohibition against the use of perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances in apparel and outdoor apparel for severe wet conditions
